info.name: Cross Currency
info.description: Collection to setup and test doing cross-network payments

item.name: Add fxp route for XOF network

request.description:
Get Quote from Payee FSP

*Note: Not implemented in Interop-Switch
Create a Quote from Payer FSP to Payee FSP
Update Quote from Payee FSP to Payer FSP

Create a Transfer Prepare Request

*Note: This request is from the Payer to the Payee

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

request.description:
Create a Transfer Fulfil Request

*Note: This must be in response to a Transfer Prepare Request from the Payee to the Payer

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds
